Description: Round-topped limestone stela of Amenemhat; low relief depiction of deceased in lower-left corner.
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM 2: Plate 5 Translation: Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Autobiographies (OBO 84): p.114-116
Exhibition history: Exhibited; 2015-2016 5th Oct - 24th Jan. New York. Metropolitan Museum of Art. Middle Kingdom.
